OpenStack Intro
================

Allows running your own cloud, allowing guests to have a virtual machine all 
to themselves, just like AWS.

* http://www.openstack.org/
* http://www.openstack.org/software/start/
* http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-compute/install/yum/content/
* http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-compute/install/yum/content/introduction-to-xen.html
